message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-end product that I believe will meet your needs. I'm willing to sell it to you for $25000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but $25000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
